PDescription: A real-time chat application built using the MERN stack and Socket.IO, enabling seamless one-on-one messaging with user authentication, live message updates, and a responsive UI. Showcases full-stack development and real-time communication skills.

A frontend-only note-taking app built with React, TanStack, and Zustand. Deployed as a static site on AWS S3 and served globally via CloudFront, highlighting cloud deployment, scalability, and performance optimization.

A classic Tic Tac Toe game built using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript with interactive gameplay and a responsive layout. Hosted on Render as a static web service, showcasing cloud deployment and frontend fundamentals.
